name: Attack on the Core
description:
Attack on the core is a cooperative shooter where the involved players will have to fight against a variety of enemies throughout a map, in a frenetic race against the clock with the objective of reaching a final map objective, defeat the main enemy and escape the deserted island before the clock runs out.

The players, before reaching the objective, will have to travel throughout the map, getting into various challenges encompassed by enemy camps and powerful enemies. Each player will embody a character which will have a specific role within the group. This design makes the game approach a teamwork style of gameplay, making the collaboration of all players a key feature of Attack on the Core. Once in the final place, the players will have to pass by a main boss in order to win the game.

Each player will take control of a very different character, each one equipped with unique abilities that they will have to use if they want to win the game.

Are you brave enough to accomplish the current mission within the established time limit? Fight, shoot, run! Choose your character according to your gameplay style, travel fast and use all at your hands in order to win this cooperative multiplayer for four persons.
